channel.title: You can only get on my server with my specific client
channel.description: is there a way to change this because i need to make a webclient but i cant because the client is screwed up and ive tried to log in but ive noiced that it said invalid client. so i had one more test i tried moparsscapes client but it didnt even log i. i checked my cmd and it said invalid client. can someone please tell me how to get rid of this?

item.title: You can only get on my server with my specific client
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

itâ€™s probably the UID, search for UID in your client class and remove if you can that entire piece of code OR!! comment out the disconnecting part of kicked part.
another option is that all the packets have been changed so only client which has matching packets can log in , but this is really unlikely.

Read full topic
item.source: You can only get on my server with my specific client

item.title: You can only get on my server with my specific client
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:
@lord_fear wrote:

You wouldent really want to get rid of this
If you keep in your keeping all the crack clients out (clients that allow people to hack)
just keep it in.
